selectWorld.trulyrandom.info: Choose which modules to include in the randomisation, these can be toggled in game, unless specified otherwise, with the "%s" key.
selectWorld.trulyrandom.block_models.too: Randomises the models of blocks that share the same shape and states.
selectWorld.trulyrandom.loot_tables.tool: Randomises the loot tables of blocks, entities, chests and more.
selectWorld.trulyrandom.recipes.tooltip: Randomises the crafting recipes of items.
selectWorld.trulyrandom.structures.toolt:
Structures will attempt to generate anywhere (dimensions with ceilings may not be affected).
§cRandomness Determined by World Seed
Cannot be changed once set
selectWorld.trulyrandom.seed.title: Seed:
selectWorld.trulyrandom.seed.tooltip: Seed that will be used to determine the randomisation.
trulyrandom.version_mismatch:
§c§lTruly Random Version Mismatch§r§c
Server is running on version "%s§c" but this client is running on version "%s§c". Some features may not work as expected.
